{"step_by_step_thinking": "Scoliosis is a lateral curvature of the spine that can occur in any part of the spine. Kyphosis is a forward rounding of the back, typically seen in the thoracic spine. Lordosis is an inward curvature of the spine, typically seen in the lumbar spine. The question asks for what is normally seen in the lumbar spine, so the answer is Lordosis.", "answer_choice": "B"}
